name: OpenIAPullRequestReview
description: This task use OpenAi GPT model to review PullRequests
author: Jailton S. Sales Jr by Mustapha Larhrouch

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Api key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Api key of OpenAi or Azure OpenAI.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: OpenAI model
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OpenAI model to use. not used if you use Azure OpenAI. if no model is selected, the GPT 3.5 Turbo model is used.

inputs.name: aoi_endpoint
inputs.label: Azure OpenApi Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure OpenApi Endpoint, leave empty to use default endpoint. (optional)

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support self-signed certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificate.

inputs.name: use_https
inputs.label: Use Agent HTTPS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to use HTTPS for the agent.
